description: Retrieves the details of a specific harvest job.

parameters.name: ChannelGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the channel group containing the channel associated with the harvest job.

parameters.name: ChannelName
parameters.description: The name of the channel associated with the harvest job.

parameters.name: OriginEndpointName
parameters.description: The name of the origin endpoint associated with the harvest job.

parameters.name: HarvestJobName
parameters.description: The name of the harvest job to retrieve.

nested_items.name: ChannelGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the channel group containing the channel associated with the harvest job.

nested_items.name: ChannelName
nested_items.description: The name of the channel associated with the harvest job.

nested_items.name: OriginEndpointName
nested_items.description: The name of the origin endpoint associated with the harvest job.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The S3 destination where the harvested content is being placed.

nested_items.name: S3Destination
nested_items.description: The configuration for exporting harvested content to an S3 bucket. This includes details such as the bucket name and destination path within the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of an S3 bucket within which harvested content will be exported.

nested_items.name: DestinationPath
nested_items.description: The path within the specified S3 bucket where the harvested content will be placed.

nested_items.name: HarvestJobName
nested_items.description: The name of the harvest job.

nested_items.name: HarvestedManifests
nested_items.description: A list of manifests that are being or have been harvested.

nested_items.name: HlsManifests
nested_items.description: A list of harvested HLS manifests.

nested_items.name: ManifestName
nested_items.description: The name of the harvested HLS manifest.

nested_items.name: DashManifests
nested_items.description: A list of harvested DASH manifests.

nested_items.name: ManifestName
nested_items.description: The name of the harvested DASH manifest.

nested_items.name: LowLatencyHlsManifests
nested_items.description: A list of harvested Low-Latency HLS manifests.

nested_items.name: ManifestName
nested_items.description: The name of the harvested Low-Latency HLS manifest.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the harvest job, if provided.

nested_items.name: ScheduleConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for when the harvest job is scheduled to run, including start and end times.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time for the harvest job.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time for the harvest job.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the harvest job.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the harvest job was created.

nested_items.name: ModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the harvest job was last modified.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the harvest job (e.g., QUEUED, IN_PROGRESS, CANCELLED, COMPLETED, FAILED).

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message if the harvest job encountered any issues.

nested_items.name: ETag
nested_items.description: The current version of the harvest job. Used for concurrency control.
(string) ---
(string) ---
